latest_items.title: Ransomware Operators Target Critical Manufacturing
latest_items.summary: Cisco Talos observed a coordinated intrusion set targeting industrial control networks with double-extortion ransomware, highlighting spear-phishing and living-off-the-land techniques.

latest_items.title: Identity Hijacking Through OAuth Abuse
latest_items.summary: Microsoft incident responders detail a surge in OAuth consent phishing that enables persistent access to cloud mailboxes, mapping mitigations with conditional access policies.

latest_items.title: Supply-Chain Zero-Day Exploits Hit CI/CD Platforms
latest_items.summary: Researchers warn that adversaries chained two fresh CVEs to deploy malicious containers across CI/CD pipelines, urging rapid patching and signed artifact verification.
